00020 #include "../system/system.h"
00021 #include "common_search.h"
00022 #include "standard_search.h"
00023 
00024 namespace Controller
00025 {
00026 
00027     template<typename VarOrder, typename Variables, typename Permutation, typename Propogator>
00028     void group_solve_loop(StateObj* stateObj, function<void (void)> next_search, VarOrder& original_order, Variables& v, Permutation& perm, Propogator prop = PropagateGAC())
00029     {
00030       int sol_count = 0;
00031       for(int i = 0; i < perm.size(); ++i)
00032       {
00033         perm[i].setMin(1);
00034         perm[i].setMax(perm.size());
00035       }
00036 
00037       getQueue(stateObj).propagateQueue();
00038       if(getState(stateObj).isFailed())
00039         return;
00040 
00041       for(int i = 0; i < perm.size(); ++i)
00042       {
00043         for(int j = i + 2; j <= perm.size(); ++j)
00044         {
00045           int world_depth = get_world_depth(stateObj);
00046           world_push(stateObj);
00047           for(int k = 0; k < i; ++k)
00048             perm[k].propagateAssign(k+1);
00049           perm[i].propagateAssign(j);
00050 
00051           getQueue(stateObj).propagateQueue();
00052           if(!getState(stateObj).isFailed())
00053           {
00054             try
00055             {
00056               VarOrder order(original_order);
00057               solve_loop(stateObj, next_search, order, v, prop, true);
00058             }
00059             catch(EndOfSearch)
00060             { 
00061               sol_count += getState(stateObj).getSolutionCount();
00062               getState(stateObj).setSolutionCount(0);
00063               getQueue(stateObj).clearQueues();
00064             }
00065           }
00066           getState(stateObj).setFailed(false);
00067           // We need this as we can exit search deep in search.
00068           D_ASSERT(world_depth < get_world_depth(stateObj));
00069           world_pop_to_depth(stateObj, world_depth);          
00070         }        
00071       }
00072 
00073       printf("Generators: %d\n", sol_count);
00074     }
00075 }
